One-BigRMSD.name: One-BigRMSD
One-BigRMSD.comment: Use with subplot preset seven for seven RMSD figures.

Rama4,3.name: Rama4,3
Rama4,3.comment: Four Ramachandran plots (WT, Y220C, PK11000, All) horizontally, and three gradients vertically below them

Rama4,4,3.name: Rama4,4,3
Rama4,4,3.comment: Similar to Rama4,3, but with a second row of Ramachandran plots under the first

One.name: One
One.comment: No subplots and ideal for two RMSD/RMSF plots side by side
